data.title: Donna Summer Died
data.meta_description:
The Disco Queen passed away at 63 after a battle with cancer.

#1

The Disco Queen passed away at 63 after a battle with cancer.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zZlSGKANVH4&feature=fvst

(One of the sexest songs ever recorded )

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1TKQcWEXSKU

That woman could sing! RIP Donna, loved your music.

Disco was king for the 70's and into the 80's. Those were the days!

"Play that funky music white boy."

Everything I've ever heard said Donna Summer was a good person and a good mother to

her kids.

You watch. She'll get next to no attention while that drug addicted Whitney

Houston was made out to be a goddess.
